verbose_text: The observed decrease in edema might have been contributed to by the limitation of cellular infiltration by sericin due to its antioxidant effects and ROS scavenging activity [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR]; the limitation of effects of mediators like plasma activated C3a and C5a; transforming growth factors beta and alpha, and PDGF [XREF_BIBR], which cause infiltration; and the sequestration by the increased number of macrophages.
